comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: This is alarming but for everyone, not only binance users for all who uses third party exchange. Anything happens anytime where you don't have control over your assets. comments.body: Quote from: Mahirap on June 06, 2023, 10:20:47 PMThis is alarming but for everyone, not only binance users for all who uses third party exchange. Anything happens anytime where you don't have control over your assets. I was alarmed about binance when they keep holding my deposit for no reason and they hold the amounts several time without providing any specific reason. The assets were released after 3 days of holding. That was my last transaction with Binance. Binance is the largest centralized exchange in the cryptocurrency world and has countless users all over the world. If the Binance exchange is frozen, there will be massive changes in crypto currencies around the world and countless people will lose their wealth. So those who are using Binance Exchange should always be careful about this. Any untoward incident can happen at any time and cause huge losses.
